name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a student who claimed to be from Tianjin Sino-German University of Applied Sciences reported the school's unfair distribution of scholarships.
According to him, the class held a scholarship evaluation in September, with a total of 4 places. As a registered poor household, he was on the list in previous years, but this year he was squeezed out by a classmate who was not in financial difficulty.
In response, a staff member of the Publicity Department of Tianjin Sino-German University of Applied Sciences said that the school is investigating the matter and will give a fair and just treatment.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Why are you crying?
You are crying for your future.

content:
Bearishness on the Chinese economy has risen to the level of national security
On November 3, the Ministry of National Security issued a document stating that finance is the lifeblood of the national economy and that we must be wary of "bears," "short sellers," "short-selling," and "hollowing out"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Kaifeng, Henan Province, in order to complete the task of "returning forests to farmland", the trees used by farmers to raise silkworms were flattened without any compensation, and farmers were required to plant wheat instead.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Shandong Agricultural Engineering College will send students to JD Logistics warehouse for "practice" on the eve of Double 11 event, but it is actually selling piglets for hard labor. Students work 12 hours a day, and the actual salary is 260, but only 140 is given to students, and the rest is deducted by the school.
Students are dissatisfied with the school's arrangement and the company's exploitation, and they express their opinions reasonably, but are accused by the school of leading the rhythm and transmitting negative energy
But in the end, the students' protest won, and JD and the school terminated this practice.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 3, a female student from Ningbo University of Finance and Economics committed suicide by jumping off a building.
The suicide note left by the girl said that she was bullied on campus and the counselor was trying to smooth things over.
Currently, students say that the school is trying to cover up the incident by saying that she accidentally fell down while drying clothes.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 3, Li Keqiang’s former residence, Hongxing Road
Overnight, it was as if nothing had happened

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 3, the Ruzhou Maternal and Child Health Hospital in Henan Province could not pay salaries for a year.
Doctors and nurses gathered to protest for their rights.
The local Health Commission said in an interview:
Is this true?
It seems so.
Why can't the salaries be paid?
No money.
How to solve the demands?
I don't know.
